title: Acid Reflux, Heartburn, and GERD Resources
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

sections.heading: MedicineNet: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD, Acid Reflux, Heartburn)
content: Learn about gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) symptoms like heartburn, chest pain , regurgitation, and nausea . Causes, diagnosis, treatment, and prevention information is also included.
EMedicineHealth: Heartburn A comprehensive look at heartburn , including tests, at-home remedies, and when to see a doctor.
American Gastroenterological Association: Heartburn Information on controlling heartburn, medications , and how to find a GI doctor in your area.
International Foundation for Functional Gastrointestinal Disorders
A nonprofit education and research organization whose mission is to inform, assist, and support people affected by gastrointestinal (GI) disorders.

meta_description: WebMD provides a list of resources for information about heartburn, acid reflux, and GERD.
